original_text: The valley was full of Midianites, Amalekites and all the people from the east. They covered the ground like locusts. There were too many men to count. Their camels also were more than the sand on the shore of the sea.
korean_text: 미디안과 아말렉과 동방의 모든 사람들이 골짜기에 누웠는데 메뚜기의 많은 수와 같고 그들의 낙타의 수가 많아 해변의 모래가 많음 같은지라

sentences.original_text: The valley was full of Midianites
Amalekites and all the people from the east
sentences.korean_translation: 아말렉 사람들과 동쪽에서 온 모든 사람들

sentences.original_text: They covered the ground like locusts
There were too many men to count
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너무 많아 셀 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: Their camels also were more than the sand
on the shore of the sea
